You do realize this is CGI? It's a funny and very cool mix of simulations of solar surface magnetic fields and rooms in laboratories.

; ) sometime i just wonder to what point some of "this"/"thoose"/"it's" "sort of" residual(s) and assimilate similitude could travel and/or be carried trough the web [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_backbone](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_backbone), sat networks or else ...

and be subject to "some" "miss"/interpretation ... 'sigh'

just an over floating %magnetic though anyway ... ... ...
